snippet: The cases, one criminal and the other civil, involved an international cartel’s price-fixing of liquid-crystal displays used in computers and cellphones.
abstract: Supreme Court declines to hear two cases involving an international price-fixing cartel in the liquid-crystal display industry, defying advice of legal experts, economists and others.
lead_paragraph: The cases, one criminal and the other civil, involved an international cartel’s price-fixing of liquid-crystal displays used in computers and cellphones.

headline.print_headline: Supreme Court Lets Stand 2 Antitrust Case Decisions
